pullrequest.title: Models for the RoboCup SPL environment

content.raw:
~~~
diff -r 3582b02f52c9 robocup_spl_ball/model.sdf
--- a/robocup_spl_ball/model.sdf	Thu Nov 14 15:33:35 2013 -0800
+++ b/robocup_spl_ball/model.sdf	Thu Nov 21 11:11:38 2013 -0800
@@ -5,6 +5,15 @@
     <link name="ball">
       <inertial>
         <mass>0.0056</mass>
+        <!-- inertia based on solid sphere 2/5 mr^2 -->
+        <inertia>
+          <ixx>2.37e-6</ixx>
+          <iyy>2.37e-6</iyy>
+          <izz>2.37e-6</izz>
+          <ixy>0</ixy>
+          <ixz>0</ixz>
+          <iyz>0</iyz>
+        </inertia>
       </inertial>
       <collision name="collision">
         <geometry>
~~~
content.html:
diff -r 3582b02f52c9 robocup_spl_ball/model.sdf
--- a/robocup_spl_ball/model.sdf    Thu Nov 14 15:33:35 2013 -0800
+++ b/robocup_spl_ball/model.sdf    Thu Nov 21 11:11:38 2013 -0800
@@ -5,6 +5,15 @@
     <link name="ball">
       <inertial>
         <mass>0.0056</mass>
+        <!-- inertia based on solid sphere 2/5 mr^2 -->
+        <inertia>
+          <ixx>2.37e-6</ixx>
+          <iyy>2.37e-6</iyy>
+          <izz>2.37e-6</izz>
+          <ixy>0</ixy>
+          <ixz>0</ixz>
+          <iyz>0</iyz>
+        </inertia>
       </inertial>
       <collision name="collision">
         <geometry>
